name: Loops of Unity Android
description:
Loops of Unity is fan game based on the Kollywood Blockbuster Movie Of The Year Maanadu (2021) . It is an endless driving game for Android mobile devices.

This game has not been monetised in any manner. Its completely a dedication from me to the movie team 

Maanaadu (transl. Conference) is a 2021 Indian Tamil -language science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Venkat Prabhu and produced by Suresh Kamatchi. The film stars Silambarasan , SJ Suryah and Kalyani Priyadharshan and others. The film's music and score is composed by Yuvan Shankar Raja. It revolves around a common man and a police officer, who is trapped in a time loop, at the day of a public conference of the chief minister and forced to live the same day over and over again.

Follow our profile to know the release of the full game and to experience the next gen games

beatfiregames.itch.io
